message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get a little more since the value decreases for me over time.
Let's split it evenly, Alice.  The value will decrease for both of us, but at least we'll start fair.
Bob, time is literally money for me in this game. Let's wrap it up and you still get a good deal.
Alice, we're getting closer to the end. This is my final offer. I'm willing to give you a little more since time is money for you.
